TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/RestoreButton extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Window::RestoreButton abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the **Restore** button of a window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每一個屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.RestoreButton>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>不同狀態的**還原**視窗 按鈕。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.RestoreButton.Normal%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowRestoreButton1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#395](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#395)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#395](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#395)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a **Restore** button in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 還原 * * 按鈕已停用狀態。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.RestoreButton.Disabled%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.RestoreButton.Disabled%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowRestoreButton3`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#397](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#397)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#397](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#397)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Hot As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a **Restore** button in the hot state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 還原 * * 按鈕處於作用中狀態。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.RestoreButton.Hot%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
